dn23:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena payasissa rajannassa evarupam papakam ditthigatam uppannam hoti:
dn23:2.2: “itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako”ti.
dn23:2.4: “samano khalu bho kumarakassapo samanassa gotamassa savako kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi setabyam anuppatto setabyayam viharati uttarena setabyam simsapavane.
dn23:2.5: Tam kho pana bhavantam kumarakassapam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
dn23:2.6: ‘pandito byatto medhavi bahussuto cittakathi kalyanapatibhano vuddho ceva araha ca.
dn23:2.7: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti’”ti.
dn23:2.8: Atha kho setabyaka brahmanagahapatika setabyaya nikkhamitva sanghasanghi ganibhuta uttarenamukha gacchanti yena simsapavanam.
dn23:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena payasi rajanno uparipasade divaseyyam upagato hoti.
dn23:3.2: Addasa kho payasi rajanno setabyake brahmanagahapatike setabyaya nikkhamitva sanghasanghi ganibhute uttarenamukhe gacchante yena simsapavanam,
dn23:3.4: “kim nu kho, bho khatte, setabyaka brahmanagahapatika setabyaya nikkhamitva sanghasanghi ganibhuta uttarenamukha gacchanti yena simsapavanan”ti?
dn23:3.5: “Atthi kho, bho, samano kumarakassapo, samanassa gotamassa savako kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi setabyam anuppatto setabyayam viharati uttarena setabyam simsapavane.

dn23:3.7: ‘pandito byatto medhavi bahussuto cittakathi kalyanapatibhano vuddho ceva araha ca’ti.
dn23:3.9: “Tena hi, bho khatte, yena setabyaka brahmanagahapatika tenupasankama; upasankamitva setabyake brahmanagahapatike evam vadehi:
dn23:3.11: agamentu kira bhavanto, payasipi rajanno samanam kumarakassapam dassanaya upasankamissati’ti.
dn23:3.12: Pura samano kumarakassapo setabyake brahmanagahapatike bale abyatte sannapeti:
dn23:3.13: ‘itipi atthi paro loko, atthi satta opapatika, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’ti.
dn23:3.14: Natthi hi, bho khatte, paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako”ti.
dn23:3.15: “Evam, bho”ti kho so khatta payasissa rajannassa patissutva yena setabyaka brahmanagahapatika tenupasankami; upasankamitva setabyake brahmanagahapatike etadavoca:
dn23:3.16: “payasi, bho, rajanno evamaha, agamentu kira bhavanto, payasipi rajanno samanam kumarakassapam dassanaya upasankamissati”ti.
dn23:4.1: Atha kho payasi rajanno setabyakehi brahmanagahapatikehi parivuto yena simsapavanam yenayasma kumarakassapo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata kumarakassapena saddhim sammodi, sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.

dn23:4.4: sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu.

dn23:5.3: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.

dn23:6.12: ‘santi kho, bho, eke samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:

dn23:6.17: “itipi atthi paro loko, atthi satta opapatika, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako”ti.

dn23:12.2: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:12.6: “Idhaham, bho kassapa, passami samanabrahmane silavante kalyanadhamme jivitukame amaritukame sukhakame dukkhapatikule.
dn23:12.7: Tassa mayham, bho kassapa, evam hoti—
dn23:12.8: sace kho ime bhonto samanabrahmana silavanto kalyanadhamma evam janeyyum:
dn23:12.10: Idanime bhonto samanabrahmana silavanto kalyanadhamma visam va khadeyyum, sattham va ahareyyum, ubbandhitva va kalam kareyyum, papate va papateyyum.
dn23:12.11: Yasma ca kho ime bhonto samanabrahmana silavanto kalyanadhamma na evam jananti:
dn23:12.12: ‘ito no matanam seyyo bhavissati’ti, tasma ime bhonto samanabrahmana silavanto kalyanadhamma jivitukama amaritukama sukhakama dukkhapatikula attanam na marenti.
dn23:12.13: Ayampi kho, bho kassapa, pariyayo, yena me pariyayena evam hoti:
dn23:12.14: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:13.2: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
dn23:13.3: Bhutapubbam, rajanna, annatarassa brahmanassa dve pajapatiyo ahesum.
dn23:13.4: Ekissa putto ahosi dasavassuddesiko va dvadasavassuddesiko va, eka gabbhini upavijanna.
dn23:13.6: Atha kho so manavako matusapattim etadavoca:
dn23:13.7: ‘yamidam, bhoti, dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va, sabbam tam mayham;
dn23:13.10: Evam vutte, sa brahmani tam manavakam etadavoca:
dn23:13.12: Sace kumarako bhavissati, tassapi ekadeso bhavissati;
dn23:13.13: sace kumarika bhavissati, sapi te opabhogga bhavissati’ti.
dn23:13.14: Dutiyampi kho so manavako matusapattim etadavoca:
dn23:13.15: ‘yamidam, bhoti, dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va, sabbam tam mayham;
dn23:13.18: Dutiyampi kho sa brahmani tam manavakam etadavoca:
dn23:13.20: Sace kumarako bhavissati, tassapi ekadeso bhavissati;
dn23:13.21: sace kumarika bhavissati sapi te opabhogga bhavissati’ti.
dn23:13.22: Tatiyampi kho so manavako matusapattim etadavoca:
dn23:13.23: ‘yamidam, bhoti, dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va, sabbam tam mayham;
dn23:13.26: Atha kho sa brahmani sattham gahetva ovarakam pavisitva udaram opadesi:
dn23:13.27: ‘yava vijayami yadi va kumarako yadi va kumarika’ti.
dn23:13.28: Sa attananceva jivitanca gabbhanca sapateyyanca vinasesi.
dn23:13.29: Yatha tam bala abyatta anayabyasanam apanna ayoniso dayajjam gavesanti, evameva kho tvam, rajanna, balo abyatto anayabyasanam apajjissasi ayoniso paralokam gavesanto;
dn23:13.30: seyyathapi sa brahmani bala abyatta anayabyasanam apanna ayoniso dayajjam gavesanti.
dn23:13.31: Na kho, rajanna, samanabrahmana silavanto kalyanadhamma apakkam paripacenti;
dn23:13.33: Panditanam attho hi, rajanna, samanabrahmananam silavantanam kalyanadhammanam jivitena.
dn23:13.34: Yatha yatha kho, rajanna, samanabrahmana silavanto kalyanadhamma ciram dighamaddhanam titthanti tatha tatha bahum punnam pasavanti, bahujanahitaya ca patipajjanti bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn23:13.35: Iminapi kho te, rajanna, pariyayena evam hotu:
dn23:13.36: ‘itipi atthi paro loko, atthi satta opapatika, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:14.1: “Kincapi bhavam kassapo evamaha, atha kho evam me ettha hoti:
dn23:14.2: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:14.6: “Idha me, bho kassapa, purisa coram agucarim gahetva dassenti:
dn23:14.8: imassa yam icchasi, tam dandam panehi’ti.
dn23:14.10: ‘tena hi, bho, imam purisam jivantamyeva kumbhiya pakkhipitva mukham pidahitva allena cammena onandhitva allaya mattikaya bahalavalepanam karitva uddhanam aropetva aggim detha’ti.
dn23:14.11: Te me ‘sadhu’ti patissutva tam purisam jivantamyeva kumbhiya pakkhipitva mukham pidahitva allena cammena onandhitva allaya mattikaya bahalavalepanam karitva uddhanam aropetva aggim denti.
dn23:14.12: Yada mayam janama ‘kalankato so puriso’ti, atha nam kumbhim oropetva ubbhinditva mukham vivaritva sanikam nillokema:
dn23:14.15: Ayampi kho, bho kassapa, pariyayo, yena me pariyayena evam hoti:
dn23:14.16: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:15.1: “Tena hi, rajanna, tannevettha patipucchissami, yatha te khameyya, tatha nam byakareyyasi.
dn23:15.2: Abhijanasi no tvam, rajanna, diva seyyam upagato supinakam passita aramaramaneyyakam vanaramaneyyakam bhumiramaneyyakam pokkharaniramaneyyakan”ti?
dn23:15.3: “Abhijanamaham, bho kassapa, divaseyyam upagato supinakam passita aramaramaneyyakam vanaramaneyyakam bhumiramaneyyakam pokkharaniramaneyyakan”ti.
dn23:15.4: “Rakkhanti tam tamhi samaye khujjapi vamanakapi velasikapi komarikapi”ti?
dn23:15.5: “Evam, bho kassapa, rakkhanti mam tamhi samaye khujjapi vamanakapi velasikapi komarikapi”ti.
dn23:15.6: “Api nu ta tuyham jivam passanti pavisantam va nikkhamantam va”ti?
dn23:15.8: “Ta hi nama, rajanna, tuyham jivantassa jivantiyo jivam na passissanti pavisantam va nikkhamantam va.
dn23:15.9: Kim pana tvam kalankatassa jivam passissasi pavisantam va nikkhamantam va.
dn23:15.10: Iminapi kho te, rajanna, pariyayena evam hotu:
dn23:15.11: ‘itipi atthi paro loko, atthi satta opapatika, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.

dn23:16.6: “Idha me, bho kassapa, purisa coram agucarim gahetva dassenti:
dn23:16.8: imassa yam icchasi, tam dandam panehi’ti.
dn23:16.10: ‘tena hi, bho, imam purisam jivantamyeva tulaya tuletva jiyaya anassasakam maretva punadeva tulaya tuletha’ti.
dn23:16.11: Te me ‘sadhu’ti patissutva tam purisam jivantamyeva tulaya tuletva jiyaya anassasakam maretva punadeva tulaya tulenti.
dn23:16.12: Yada so jivati, tada lahutaro ca hoti mudutaro ca kammannataro ca.
dn23:16.13: Yada pana so kalankato hoti tada garutaro ca hoti patthinnataro ca akammannataro ca.
dn23:16.14: Ayampi kho, bho kassapa, pariyayo, yena me pariyayena evam hoti:
dn23:16.15: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:17.2: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
dn23:17.3: Seyyathapi, rajanna, puriso divasam santattam ayogulam adittam sampajjalitam sajotibhutam tulaya tuleyya.
dn23:17.4: Tamenam aparena samayena sitam nibbutam tulaya tuleyya.
dn23:17.5: Kada nu kho so ayogulo lahutaro va hoti mudutaro va kammannataro va, yada va aditto sampajjalito sajotibhuto, yada va sito nibbuto”ti?
dn23:17.6: “Yada so, bho kassapa, ayogulo tejosahagato ca hoti vayosahagato ca aditto sampajjalito sajotibhuto, tada lahutaro ca hoti mudutaro ca kammannataro ca.
dn23:17.7: Yada pana so ayogulo neva tejosahagato hoti na vayosahagato sito nibbuto, tada garutaro ca hoti patthinnataro ca akammannataro ca”ti.
dn23:17.8: “Evameva kho, rajanna, yadayam kayo ayusahagato ca hoti usmasahagato ca vinnanasahagato ca, tada lahutaro ca hoti mudutaro ca kammannataro ca.
dn23:17.9: Yada panayam kayo neva ayusahagato hoti na usmasahagato na vinnanasahagato tada garutaro ca hoti patthinnataro ca akammannataro ca.
dn23:17.10: Iminapi kho te, rajanna, pariyayena evam hotu:
dn23:17.11: ‘itipi atthi paro loko, atthi satta opapatika, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:18.1: “Kincapi bhavam kassapo evamaha, atha kho evam me ettha hoti:
dn23:18.2: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:18.6: “Idha me, bho kassapa, purisa coram agucarim gahetva dassenti:
dn23:18.8: imassa yam icchasi, tam dandam panehi’ti.
dn23:18.10: ‘tena hi, bho, imam purisam anupahacca chavinca cammanca mamsanca nharunca atthinca atthiminjanca jivita voropetha, appeva namassa jivam nikkhamantam passeyyama’ti.
dn23:18.11: Te me ‘sadhu’ti patissutva tam purisam anupahacca chavinca …pe… jivita voropenti.
dn23:18.12: Yada so amato hoti, tyaham evam vadami:
dn23:18.13: ‘tena hi, bho, imam purisam uttanam nipatetha, appeva namassa jivam nikkhamantam passeyyama’ti.
dn23:18.17: ‘tena hi, bho, imam purisam avakujjam nipatetha …
dn23:18.26: odhunatha sandhunatha niddhunatha, appeva namassa jivam nikkhamantam passeyyama’ti.
dn23:18.27: Te tam purisam odhunanti sandhunanti niddhunanti.
dn23:18.29: Tassa tadeva cakkhu hoti te rupa, tancayatanam nappatisamvedeti.
dn23:18.30: Tadeva sotam hoti te sadda, tancayatanam nappatisamvedeti.
dn23:18.31: Tadeva ghanam hoti te gandha, tancayatanam nappatisamvedeti.
dn23:18.32: Sava jivha hoti te rasa, tancayatanam nappatisamvedeti.
dn23:18.33: Sveva kayo hoti te photthabba, tancayatanam nappatisamvedeti.
dn23:18.34: Ayampi kho, bho kassapa, pariyayo, yena me pariyayena evam hoti:
dn23:18.35: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.
dn23:19.2: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
dn23:19.3: Bhutapubbam, rajanna, annataro sankhadhamo sankham adaya paccantimam janapadam agamasi.
dn23:19.4: So yena annataro gamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva majjhe gamassa thito tikkhattum sankham upalapetva sankham bhumiyam nikkhipitva ekamantam nisidi.
dn23:19.5: Atha kho, rajanna, tesam paccantajanapadanam manussanam etadahosi:
dn23:19.6: ‘ambho kassa nu kho eso saddo evamrajaniyo evankamaniyo evammadaniyo evambandhaniyo evammucchaniyo’ti.
dn23:19.8: ‘ambho, kassa nu kho eso saddo evamrajaniyo evankamaniyo evammadaniyo evambandhaniyo evammucchaniyo’ti.
dn23:19.9: ‘Eso kho, bho, sankho nama yasseso saddo evamrajaniyo evankamaniyo evammadaniyo evambandhaniyo evammucchaniyo’ti.
dn23:19.13: Te tam sankham avakujjam nipatesum, passena nipatesum, dutiyena passena nipatesum, uddham thapesum, omuddhakam thapesum, panina akotesum, ledduna akotesum, dandena akotesum, satthena akotesum, odhunimsu sandhunimsu niddhunimsu:
dn23:19.16: Atha kho, rajanna, tassa sankhadhamassa etadahosi:
dn23:19.17: ‘yava bala ime paccantajanapada manussa, kathanhi nama ayoniso sankhasaddam gavesissanti’ti.
dn23:19.18: Tesam pekkhamananam sankham gahetva tikkhattum sankham upalapetva sankham adaya pakkami.
dn23:19.19: Atha kho, rajanna, tesam paccantajanapadanam manussanam etadahosi:
dn23:19.20: ‘yada kira, bho, ayam sankho nama purisasahagato ca hoti vayamasahagato ca vayusahagato ca, tadayam sankho saddam karoti, yada panayam sankho neva purisasahagato hoti na vayamasahagato na vayusahagato, nayam sankho saddam karoti’ti.
dn23:19.21: Evameva kho, rajanna, yadayam kayo ayusahagato ca hoti usmasahagato ca vinnanasahagato ca, tada abhikkamatipi patikkamatipi titthatipi nisidatipi seyyampi kappeti, cakkhunapi rupam passati, sotenapi saddam sunati, ghanenapi gandham ghayati, jivhayapi rasam sayati, kayenapi photthabbam phusati, manasapi dhammam vijanati.
dn23:19.22: Yada panayam kayo neva ayusahagato hoti, na usmasahagato, na vinnanasahagato, tada neva abhikkamati na patikkamati na titthati na nisidati na seyyam kappeti, cakkhunapi rupam na passati, sotenapi saddam na sunati, ghanenapi gandham na ghayati, jivhayapi rasam na sayati, kayenapi photthabbam na phusati, manasapi dhammam na vijanati.
dn23:19.23: Iminapi kho te, rajanna, pariyayena evam hotu:
dn23:19.24: ‘itipi atthi paro loko, atthi satta opapatika, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti.

dn23:20.6: “Idha me, bho kassapa, purisa coram agucarim gahetva dassenti:
dn23:20.8: imassa yam icchasi, tam dandam panehi’ti.

dn23:20.14: ‘tena hi, bho, imassa purisassa cammam chindatha, mamsam chindatha, nharum chindatha, atthim chindatha, atthiminjam chindatha, appeva namassa jivam passeyyama’ti.
dn23:20.15: Te tassa purisassa atthiminjam chindanti, nevassa mayam jivam passeyyama.
dn23:20.16: Ayampi kho, bho kassapa, pariyayo, yena me pariyayena evam hoti:

dn23:21.2: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
dn23:21.3: Bhutapubbam, rajanna, annataro aggiko jatilo arannayatane pannakutiya sammati.
dn23:21.4: Atha kho, rajanna, annataro janapade sattho vutthasi.
dn23:21.5: Atha kho so sattho tassa aggikassa jatilassa assamassa samanta ekarattim vasitva pakkami.
dn23:21.6: Atha kho, rajanna, tassa aggikassa jatilassa etadahosi:
dn23:21.7: ‘yannunaham yena so satthavaso tenupasankameyyam, appeva namettha kinci upakaranam adhigaccheyyan’ti.
dn23:21.8: Atha kho so aggiko jatilo kalasseva vutthaya yena so satthavaso tenupasankami; upasankamitva addasa tasmim satthavase daharam kumaram mandam uttanaseyyakam chadditam.
dn23:21.10: ‘na kho me tam patirupam yam me pekkhamanassa manussabhuto kalankareyya;
dn23:21.11: yannunaham imam darakam assamam netva apadeyyam poseyyam vaddheyyan’ti.
dn23:21.12: Atha kho so aggiko jatilo tam darakam assamam netva apadesi posesi vaddhesi.
dn23:21.13: Yada so darako dasavassuddesiko va hoti dvadasavassuddesiko va, atha kho tassa aggikassa jatilassa janapade kancideva karaniyam uppajji.
dn23:21.14: Atha kho so aggiko jatilo tam darakam etadavoca:
dn23:21.18: Sace ca te aggi nibbayeyya, ayam vasi imani katthani idam aranisahitam, aggim nibbattetva aggim paricareyyasi’ti.
dn23:21.19: Atha kho so aggiko jatilo tam darakam evam anusasitva janapadam agamasi.
dn23:21.25: Sace ca te aggi nibbayeyya, ayam vasi imani katthani idam aranisahitam, aggim nibbattetva aggim paricareyyasi”ti.
dn23:21.27: Atha kho so darako aranisahitam vasiya tacchi:
dn23:21.30: Aranisahitam dvidha phalesi, tidha phalesi, catudha phalesi, pancadha phalesi, dasadha phalesi, satadha phalesi, sakalikam sakalikam akasi, sakalikam sakalikam karitva udukkhale kottesi, udukkhale kottetva mahavate opuni:
dn23:21.33: Atha kho so aggiko jatilo janapade tam karaniyam tiretva yena sako assamo tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam darakam etadavoca:
dn23:21.37: “pita kho mam evam avaca aggim, tata, paricareyyasi.
dn23:21.38: Ma ca te, tata, aggi nibbayi.
dn23:21.39: Sace ca te aggi nibbayeyya, ayam vasi imani katthani idam aranisahitam, aggim nibbattetva aggim paricareyyasiti.
dn23:21.41: Atha khvaham, tata, aranisahitam vasiya tacchim:
dn23:21.44: Aranisahitam dvidha phalesim, tidha phalesim, catudha phalesim, pancadha phalesim, dasadha phalesim, satadha phalesim, sakalikam sakalikam akasim, sakalikam sakalikam karitva udukkhale kottesim, udukkhale kottetva mahavate opunim:
dn23:21.47: Atha kho tassa aggikassa jatilassa etadahosi:
dn23:21.48: ‘yava balo ayam darako abyatto, kathanhi nama ayoniso aggim gavesissati’ti.
dn23:21.49: Tassa pekkhamanassa aranisahitam gahetva aggim nibbattetva tam darakam etadavoca:
dn23:21.51: Na tveva yatha tvam balo abyatto ayoniso aggim gavesi’ti.
dn23:21.52: Evameva kho tvam, rajanna, balo abyatto ayoniso paralokam gavesissasi.
dn23:21.53: Patinissajjetam, rajanna, papakam ditthigatam; patinissajjetam, rajanna, papakam ditthigatam.
dn23:21.54: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya”ti.
dn23:22.1: “Kincapi bhavam kassapo evamaha, atha kho nevaham sakkomi idam papakam ditthigatam patinissajjitum.
dn23:22.2: Rajapi mam pasenadi kosalo janati tirorajanopi:
dn23:22.4: “itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako”’ti.
dn23:22.5: Sacaham, bho kassapa, idam papakam ditthigatam patinissajjissami, bhavissanti me vattaro:
dn23:22.7: Kopenapi nam harissami, makkhenapi nam harissami, palasenapi nam harissami”ti.
dn23:23.2: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
dn23:23.3: Bhutapubbam, rajanna, mahasakatasattho sakatasahassam puratthima janapada pacchimam janapadam agamasi.
dn23:23.4: So yena yena gacchi, khippamyeva pariyadiyati tinakatthodakam haritakapannam.
dn23:23.5: Tasmim kho pana satthe dve satthavaha ahesum eko pancannam sakatasatanam, eko pancannam sakatasatanam.
dn23:23.8: te mayam yena yena gacchama, khippameva pariyadiyati tinakatthodakam haritakapannam.
dn23:23.9: Yannuna mayam imam sattham dvidha vibhajeyyama—
dn23:23.10: ekato panca sakatasatani ekato panca sakatasatani’ti.
dn23:23.11: Te tam sattham dvidha vibhajimsu ekato panca sakatasatani, ekato panca sakatasatani.
dn23:23.12: Eko satthavaho bahum tinanca katthanca udakanca aropetva sattham payapesi.
dn23:23.13: Dvihatihapayato kho pana so sattho addasa purisam kalam lohitakkham sannaddhakalapam kumudamalim allavattham allakesam kaddamamakkhitehi cakkehi bhadrena rathena patipatham agacchantam, disva etadavoca:
dn23:23.19: ‘Evam, bho, purato kantare mahamegho abhippavuttho, asittodakani vatumani, bahu tinanca katthanca udakanca.
dn23:23.20: Chaddetha, bho, puranani tinani katthani udakani, lahubharehi sakatehi sigham sigham gacchatha, ma yoggani kilamittha’ti.
dn23:23.21: Atha kho so satthavaho satthike amantesi:
dn23:23.23: “purato kantare mahamegho abhippavuttho, asittodakani vatumani, bahu tinanca katthanca udakanca.
dn23:23.24: Chaddetha, bho, puranani tinani katthani udakani, lahubharehi sakatehi sigham sigham gacchatha, ma yoggani kilamittha”ti.
dn23:23.25: Chaddetha, bho, puranani tinani katthani udakani, lahubharehi sakatehi sattham payapetha’ti.
dn23:23.26: ‘Evam, bho’ti kho te satthika tassa satthavahassa patissutva chaddetva puranani tinani katthani udakani lahubharehi sakatehi sattham payapesum.
dn23:23.27: Te pathamepi satthavase na addasamsu tinam va kattham va udakam va.
dn23:23.33: sattamepi satthavase na addasamsu tinam va kattham va udakam va.
dn23:23.35: Ye ca tasmim satthe ahesum manussa va pasu va, sabbe so yakkho amanusso bhakkhesi.
dn23:23.38: ‘bahunikkhanto kho, bho, dani so sattho’ti bahum tinanca katthanca udakanca aropetva sattham payapesi.
dn23:23.39: Dvihatihapayato kho pana so sattho addasa purisam kalam lohitakkham sannaddhakalapam kumudamalim allavattham allakesam kaddamamakkhitehi cakkehi bhadrena rathena patipatham agacchantam, disva etadavoca:
dn23:23.45: ‘Evam, bho, purato kantare mahamegho abhippavuttho. Asittodakani vatumani, bahu tinanca katthanca udakanca.
dn23:23.46: Chaddetha, bho, puranani tinani katthani udakani, lahubharehi sakatehi sigham sigham gacchatha, ma yoggani kilamittha’ti.
dn23:23.47: Atha kho so satthavaho satthike amantesi:
dn23:23.49: “purato kantare mahamegho abhippavuttho, asittodakani vatumani, bahu tinanca katthanca udakanca.
dn23:23.50: Chaddetha, bho, puranani tinani katthani udakani, lahubharehi sakatehi sigham sigham gacchatha; ma yoggani kilamittha”ti.
dn23:23.51: Ayam bho puriso neva amhakam mitto, na natisalohito, katham mayam imassa saddhaya gamissama.
dn23:23.52: Na vo chaddetabbani puranani tinani katthani udakani, yathabhatena bhandena sattham payapetha.
dn23:23.54: ‘Evam, bho’ti kho te satthika tassa satthavahassa patissutva yathabhatena bhandena sattham payapesum.
dn23:23.55: Te pathamepi satthavase na addasamsu tinam va kattham va udakam va.
dn23:23.61: sattamepi satthavase na addasamsu tinam va kattham va udakam va.
dn23:23.63: Ye ca tasmim satthepi ahesum manussa va pasu va, tesanca atthikaneva addasamsu tena yakkhena amanussena bhakkhitanam.
dn23:23.64: Atha kho so satthavaho satthike amantesi:
dn23:23.65: ‘ayam kho, bho, sattho anayabyasanam apanno, yatha tam tena balena satthavahena parinayakena.
dn23:23.66: Tena hi, bho, yanamhakam satthe appasarani paniyani, tani chaddetva, yani imasmim satthe mahasarani paniyani, tani adiyatha’ti.
dn23:23.67: ‘Evam, bho’ti kho te satthika tassa satthavahassa patissutva yani sakasmim satthe appasarani paniyani, tani chaddetva yani tasmim satthe mahasarani paniyani, tani adiyitva sotthina tam kantaram nittharimsu, yatha tam panditena satthavahena parinayakena.
dn23:23.68: Evameva kho tvam, rajanna, balo abyatto anayabyasanam apajjissasi ayoniso paralokam gavesanto, seyyathapi so purimo satthavaho.
dn23:23.69: Yepi tava sotabbam saddhatabbam mannissanti, tepi anayabyasanam apajjissanti, seyyathapi te satthika.

dn23:24.1: “Kincapi bhavam kassapo evamaha, atha kho nevaham sakkomi idam papakam ditthigatam patinissajjitum.
dn23:24.2: Rajapi mam pasenadi kosalo janati tirorajanopi: ‘payasi rajanno evamvadi evamditthi:
dn23:24.4: Sacaham, bho kassapa, idam papakam ditthigatam patinissajjissami, bhavissanti me vattaro:
dn23:24.6: Kopenapi nam harissami, makkhenapi nam harissami, palasenapi nam harissami”ti.
dn23:25.2: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
dn23:25.3: Bhutapubbam, rajanna, annataro sukaraposako puriso sakamha gama annam gamam agamasi.
dn23:25.6: ‘ayam kho pahuto sukkhagutho chaddito, mama ca sukarabhattam;
dn23:25.8: So uttarasangam pattharitva pahutam sukkhagutham akiritva bhandikam bandhitva sise ubbahetva agamasi.
dn23:25.10: So uggharantam paggharantam yava agganakha guthena makkhito guthabharam adaya agamasi.
dn23:25.12: ‘kacci no tvam, bhane, ummatto, kacci viceto, kathanhi nama uggharantam paggharantam yava agganakha guthena makkhito guthabharam harissasi’ti.
dn23:25.13: ‘Tumhe khvettha, bhane, ummatta, tumhe viceta, tatha hi pana me sukarabhattan’ti.
dn23:25.14: Evameva kho tvam, rajanna, guthabharikupamo manne patibhasi.
dn23:25.15: Patinissajjetam, rajanna, papakam ditthigatam; patinissajjetam, rajanna, papakam ditthigatam.
dn23:25.16: Ma te ahosi digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya”ti.

dn23:30.1: “Purimeneva aham opammena bhoto kassapassa attamano abhiraddho.
dn23:30.2: Api caham imani vicitrani panhapatibhanani sotukamo evaham bhavantam kassapam paccanikam katabbam amannissam.
dn23:30.3: Abhikkantam, bho kassapa, abhikkantam, bho kassapa.
dn23:30.4: Seyyathapi, bho kassapa, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota kassapena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
dn23:30.5: Esaham, bho kassapa, tam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchami, dhammanca, bhikkhusanghanca.
dn23:30.6: Upasakam mam bhavam kassapo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatam.
dn23:30.7: Icchami caham, bho kassapa, mahayannam yajitum, anusasatu mam bhavam kassapo, yam mamassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
dn23:31.1: “Yatharupe kho, rajanna, yanne gavo va hannanti ajelaka va hannanti, kukkutasukara va hannanti, vividha va pana sanghatam apajjanti, patiggahaka ca honti micchaditthi micchasankappa micchavaca micchakammanta micchaajiva micchavayama micchasati micchasamadhi, evarupo kho, rajanna, yanno na mahapphalo hoti na mahanisamso na mahajutiko na mahavippharo.
dn23:31.2: Seyyathapi, rajanna, kassako bijanangalam adaya vanam paviseyya.
dn23:31.3: So tattha dukkhette dubbhume avihatakhanukantake bijani patitthapeyya khandani putini vatatapahatani asaradani asukhasayitani.
dn23:31.4: Devo ca na kalena kalam sammadharam anuppaveccheyya.
dn23:31.5: Api nu tani bijani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyum, kassako va vipulam phalam adhigaccheyya”ti?
dn23:31.7: “Evameva kho, rajanna, yatharupe yanne gavo va hannanti, ajelaka va hannanti, kukkutasukara va hannanti, vividha va pana sanghatam apajjanti, patiggahaka ca honti micchaditthi micchasankappa micchavaca micchakammanta micchaajiva micchavayama micchasati micchasamadhi, evarupo kho, rajanna, yanno na mahapphalo hoti na mahanisamso na mahajutiko na mahavippharo.
dn23:31.8: Yatharupe ca kho, rajanna, yanne neva gavo hannanti, na ajelaka hannanti, na kukkutasukara hannanti, na vividha va pana sanghatam apajjanti, patiggahaka ca honti sammaditthi sammasankappa sammavaca sammakammanta sammaajiva sammavayama sammasati sammasamadhi, evarupo kho, rajanna, yanno mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
dn23:31.9: Seyyathapi, rajanna, kassako bijanangalam adaya vanam paviseyya.
dn23:31.10: So tattha sukhette subhume suvihatakhanukantake bijani patitthapeyya akhandani aputini avatatapahatani saradani sukhasayitani.
dn23:31.11: Devo ca kalena kalam sammadharam anuppaveccheyya.
dn23:31.12: Api nu tani bijani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyum, kassako va vipulam phalam adhigaccheyya”ti?
dn23:31.14: “Evameva kho, rajanna, yatharupe yanne neva gavo hannanti, na ajelaka hannanti, na kukkutasukara hannanti, na vividha va pana sanghatam apajjanti, patiggahaka ca honti sammaditthi sammasankappa sammavaca sammakammanta sammaajiva sammavayama sammasati sammasamadhi, evarupo kho, rajanna, yanno mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo”ti.
dn23:32.1: Atha kho payasi rajanno danam patthapesi samanabrahmanakapanaddhikavanibbakayacakanam.
dn23:32.2: Tasmim kho pana dane evarupam bhojanam diyati kanajakam bilangadutiyam, dhorakani ca vatthani gulavalakani.
dn23:32.3: Tasmim kho pana dane uttaro nama manavo vavato ahosi.
dn23:32.5: “iminaham danena payasim rajannameva imasmim loke samagacchim, ma parasmin”ti.
dn23:32.7: “uttaro kira manavo danam datva evam anuddisati:
dn23:32.8: ‘iminaham danena payasim rajannameva imasmim loke samagacchim, ma parasmin’”ti.
dn23:32.9: Atha kho payasi rajanno uttaram manavam amantapetva etadavoca:
dn23:32.10: “saccam kira tvam, tata uttara, danam datva evam anuddisasi:
dn23:32.11: ‘iminaham danena payasim rajannameva imasmim loke samagacchim, ma parasmin’”ti?
dn23:32.13: “Kissa pana tvam, tata uttara, danam datva evam anuddisasi:
dn23:32.14: ‘iminaham danena payasim rajannameva imasmim loke samagacchim, ma parasmin’ti?
dn23:32.15: Nanu mayam, tata uttara, punnatthika danasseva phalam patikankhino”ti?
dn23:32.16: “Bhoto kho dane evarupam bhojanam diyati kanajakam bilangadutiyam, yam bhavam padapi na iccheyya samphusitum, kuto bhunjitum, dhorakani ca vatthani gulavalakani, yani bhavam padapi na iccheyya samphusitum, kuto paridahitum.
dn23:32.17: Bhavam kho panamhakam piyo manapo, katham mayam manapam amanapena samyojema”ti?
dn23:32.18: “Tena hi tvam, tata uttara, yadisaham bhojanam bhunjami, tadisam bhojanam patthapehi.
dn23:32.19: Yadisani caham vatthani paridahami, tadisani ca vatthani patthapehi”ti.
dn23:32.20: “Evam, bho”ti kho uttaro manavo payasissa rajannassa patissutva yadisam bhojanam payasi rajanno bhunjati, tadisam bhojanam patthapesi.
dn23:32.21: Yadisani ca vatthani payasi rajanno paridahati, tadisani ca vatthani patthapesi.
dn23:32.22: Atha kho payasi rajanno asakkaccam danam datva asahattha danam datva acittikatam danam datva apaviddham danam datva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajji sunnam serisakam vimanam.
dn23:32.23: Yo pana tassa dane vavato ahosi uttaro nama manavo. So sakkaccam danam datva sahattha danam datva cittikatam danam datva anapaviddham danam datva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajji devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam.
dn23:33.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma gavampati abhikkhanam sunnam serisakam vimanam divaviharam gacchati.
dn23:33.2: Atha kho payasi devaputto yenayasma gavampati tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam gavampatim abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thitam kho payasim devaputtam ayasma gavampati etadavoca:
dn23:33.6: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’”ti?
dn23:33.8: ‘itipi natthi paro loko, natthi satta opapatika, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako’ti.
dn23:33.9: Api caham ayyena kumarakassapena etasma papaka ditthigata vivecito”ti.
dn23:33.10: “Yo pana te, avuso, dane vavato ahosi uttaro nama manavo, so kuhim upapanno”ti?
dn23:33.11: “Yo me, bhante, dane vavato ahosi uttaro nama manavo, so sakkaccam danam datva sahattha danam datva cittikatam danam datva anapaviddham danam datva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanno devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam.

dn23:33.13: Tena hi, bhante gavampati, manussalokam gantva evamarocehi:
dn23:33.14: ‘sakkaccam danam detha, sahattha danam detha, cittikatam danam detha, anapaviddham danam detha.
dn23:33.15: Payasi rajanno asakkaccam danam datva asahattha danam datva acittikatam danam datva apaviddham danam datva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapanno sunnam serisakam vimanam.
